description: Snapdragon (Antirrhinum 'Dulcinea's Heart') is an amazing plant species for its showy, colorful flowers! This annual is a great addition to a garden or landscape with its bright yellow, orange, purple, and red highlights. It reaches 12 to 18 inches in height and tolerates sun or light shade, making it perfect for any garden. Its big, trumpet-shaped blooms attract hummingbirds, while its low-maintenance, mounding habits add an interesting textural element. Plus, it doesn't require any deadheading or coddling! Enjoy its gentle beauty and delicate fragrance in the garden year-round.
